name: Looters 1
description:
(24mb, may load slowly)

WSAD / ARROWS or LMB = Move
SHIFT = Toggle Dash
ENTER or E or LMB = Action / Ok
LMB on Enemy = Use Weapon
F = Toggle Aim , LMB = Attack
R = Reload
ESCAPE or RMB = Cancel / Menu

SAVE AND LOAD FROM MAIN MENU

    Stuck in the zombie infested forests of the Sierra Nevada foothills, Cristy and Jeremy must find a vehicle so they can reach shelter.  As they battle through forests, farms and factories they must be careful not to starve, dehydrate, or bleed to death.

Maps, Story, Gameplay and Music created by:
Jeremy Smith  www.jeremymichaelsmith.com 

Horror City Pixel Art available from:
MalibuDarby  https://malibudarby.itch.io/

Javascripts Many Javascripts
Galv, Yanfly, SumRndmDude, I'll add more links here soon

WARNING: Some coarse language and mild violence.
